name: Life Adventure (MattKa, Piitr)
description:
Our hero goes through life, trying to achieve the ultimate happiness - can you help him find it in this 2D platformer game?

The game was optimized only for 16:9 resolutions and won't look that well on other screen sizes.

This extremely short game was made GAMEHIGHED Jam 2021. The theme was YOLO.

Controls: Left and right arrow keys to move, up key to jump.

Authors:

MattKa - Programming

Piitr - Art
